newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian services almost flat in February.
newsitem.headline: Romanian services almost flat in February.

text.p: Turnover of Romanian commercial service companies was almost flat in February from the previous month but was 9.9 percent down year-on-year, National Statistics Board (CNS) data showed on Monday.
It said the downward trend in services in first two months 1997, when they slipped 7.6 percent from the same 1996 period, reflected shrinking consumption.
Hotel and restaurant businesses saw a 21.7 percent fall in January-February, when repairs of household appliances were 15.1 percent up from a year earlier.
Figures refer to commercial services, excluding transport, mail and telecoms.
